title.rendered: Prince Harry Deportation Debate Rages On

content.rendered:
Should Prince Harry be deported?

Believe it or not, that’s an actual topic of debate these days.

A conservative thinktank known as the Heritage Foundation successfully lobbied for the release of Harry’s visa application. Now, a heavily redacted version has been made public, and the group is not happy.
